scripts.bump-dependencies: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.shared.json node --loader tsm scripts/bump-dependencies.ts css-loader style-loader
scripts.clean: lerna run clean --parallel --stream && lerna run storybook-clean --stream && yarn run website-clean && rm -rf '*.log'
scripts.fix: lerna run fix --parallel --stream && eslint --fix 'scripts/**/*.ts' && prettier --ignore-path lerna.json --loglevel error --write '*.json'
scripts.postinstall: simple-git-hooks && yarn run patch-figma-plugin-typings && yarn run build
scripts.publish: yarn run build && lerna publish from-package
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && lerna clean --yes && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.website-build: yarn run website-clean && yarn run website-build-docs && yarn run website-build-storybook && cp packages/build/src/figma-plugin.json build/create-figma-plugin
scripts.website-build-docs: yarn run generate-docs && lerna run build --scope website && cpy --cwd packages/website/build --parents '**/*' ../../../build

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: yarn run lint && yarn run fix && yarn run test
